OrgName: Aramark Services, Inc. and its direct and indirect, wholly-owned U.S. subsidiaries
activities: Aramark processes human resources personal information for workforce administration and management.  Aramark also processes client representative personal information for client relationship administration and management.  Client representatives are individuals who are representatives of former, current, or prospective clients of Aramark or any of its direct or indirect affiliates or subsidiaries located in the EEA or Switzerland.
eucountries: Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: off-line, on-line, and manually processed human resources data and client representative data
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC), as appropriate.
